name: MT-MyTelegramOrg-Bot
description: get your APP ID and API HASH inside Telegram

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

APP_SHORT_NAME.description: specify a custom alphamumeric shortname (5-32 characters)

FTEXT.description: the footer text that will be seen in the bot message, after the final edit
